Articles.Content: My old RP-0 save got so laggy and buggy it was unplayable.  I started a new career but it seems I have already slowed down to 2:1 on a basic barely orbital rocket.  Any suggestions or should I just reinstall?  I felt like I managed to get Moon orbit or landing by the time the yellow timer started to appear.
Are you talking about a mod? Why not ask for help in that mod's thread? It's the place people are most likely to know something about it.
